requirement.description: The transparency requirement (ref. GDPR Art. 13 and 14) that is addressed by the annotated phrase.

value.description: The exact word or phrase that is annotated, with non-relevant injected clauses abbreviated as 'PLACEHOLDER'.

performed.description: Indicates whether the phrase addresses the transparency requirement in the positive or negative (e.g. 'we collect X data' vs. 'we do not collect X data').
